thread.title: harley
thread.title_full: CeX/WeBuy - United Kingdom reviewed by harley

author: harley
title: harley
text: Went in because my phone had broke, they had a look at it agreed with me that it was broken and refunded the money for a new one. Obviously I got a new one from them and I didn't like the colour so I took it back again and asked for a different colour they was very patient and understanding with me, will go again
